comment.author: 10345328@N02
comment._content: Sunk August 9th 1942 in the Battle Of Savo Island after torpedo and gun hits from Japanese surface ships. She had to be scuttled. 193 lives lost including her Captain. www.pacificwrecks.com/ships/hmas/canberra.html

comment.author: 41675580@N08
comment._content: An elegent ship, a tragic end.
